titulo: Easy Spanish Readers Five Short Stories in Spanish for Beginners (Spanish Edition): Audio and Exercises with Key; Improve Your Spanish Reading Listening Vocabulary and Grammar
descripcion:
Do you want to practice Spanish in a fun and effective way? Try Easy Spanish Readers. Easy Spanish Readers is a collection of short fictional stories in Spanish to read and listen. Easy Spanish Readers have been written and selected especially for lower level students of Spanish. This series of graded readers has something for everyone, with a mix of original fiction and culture books.
